description: The OR_LOG_TIMING_EVENTS table contains information about case timing events associated with a procedural case that has been performed.

columns.name: LOG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID associated with the log record for this row.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: TIMING_EVENT_C_NAME
columns.description:
The case timing event category ID for the procedure log.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Case Request


Anesthesia Sign-off


Anesthesia Close Encounter


Anesthesia Last Addendum


Scheduled Setup Start


Anesthesia Epidural to C-Section


Scheduled In Room


Scheduled Procedure Start


Scheduled Procedure Complete


Scheduled Out of Room


Scheduled Cleanup Complete


Facility Discharge


In Facility


In Preprocedure


Room Setup Start


Room Ready


Anesthesia Start


Preprocedure Complete


In Room


Anesthesia Induction


Anesthesia Ready


Procedure Start


Incision Start


Incision Closing


Procedure Complete


Out of Room

Room Cleanup Complete


In Recovery


Anesthesia Stop


Ready for Discharge from Recovery


Out of Recovery


In Phase II


Ready for Discharge from Phase II


Out of Phase II


Anesthesia Emergence


Intubation


Extubation


Surgeon Ready


Sedation Start


Sedation Stop


Service Start


Secure Chat Unavailability Begin Timing Event


Secure Chat Unavailability End Timing Event


Snapboard Prep End Display


Snapboard Wrap-up Start Display


Utilization Setup Start


Utilization Procedure Start


Utilization Procedure End


Utilization Cleanup End

columns.name: TIMING_EVENT_DTTM
columns.description: The case timing event instant for the procedure log.
